company.name: Aktonz Estate Agents
company.tagline: London lettings, sales and asset management
company.mission: We combine deep local expertise with smart data insights to match every client with the right property faster.
services: Tailored search for renters, buyers and corporate relocations
End-to-end landlord services including compliance, marketing and portfolio strategy
Sales progression with proactive weekly updates
Instant viewing scheduling and digital offer negotiation

listings.title: Room 4, 41 Ilkeston Court
listings.summary: Furnished double room in a four-bedroom maisonette with an open-plan kitchen, secure fob access and wood flooring throughout.

listings.title: Boutique Four Bedroom Maisonette
listings.summary: Pet-friendly duplex with a roof terrace, private balcony and instant viewing slots.

listings.title: Stylish Four Bedroom Apartment
listings.summary: Smart-home enabled apartment with residents' gym access and skyline views.

listings.title: Earls Court Road Apartment
listings.address: Earls Court Road, South Kensington, London SW5
listings.summary: First-floor one bedroom flat with high ceilings, big windows and private balcony moments from Earl's Court station.

appointments.location: Aktonz HQ, 14 Abersham Road, London E8 2LN
appointments.notes: Review Shoreditch shortlist and prepare referencing documents.
Discuss renewal strategy and pricing for Hackney portfolio.

viewings.notes: Keys to be collected from concierge at 11:45. Prospect bringing partner.
Corporate relocation team requested a later slot; awaiting landlord approval.

offers.notes: Buyer is mortgage-in-principle approved with completion flexibility of 6-8 weeks.
Tenant referencing expected back by 18 March; landlord happy to include professional cleaning.

contacts.name: Sophie Turner
contacts.searchFocus: 2-bedroom, pet-friendly rentals in Shoreditch and Islington up to £2,300 pcm
activeRequirements: Pet friendly with nearby green space
Move-in window between April and May

conversations.summary: Confirmed interest in Shoreditch E2 options and scheduled the Fitzrovia viewing for 20 March.
Shared curated shortlist with virtual tours and referencing checklist.
Discussed pet policy confirmation and landlord flexibility on furnished items.

conversations.summary: Vendor feedback pending; discussed comparable sales on Earls Court Road.
